title: Channel Your Energy ( Russ and Miguel Cardona interview)
itunes:title: Channel Your Energy ( Russ and Miguel Cardona interview)
description:
Today on the show we had Russ stop by where he spoke about his new album, fake support, and channeling his energy into production. Also, we had Secretary of Education Miguel Cardona stop by who spoke on his position, supporting HBCU's and more. Lastly, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who killed his wife with a fatal dose of heroin in her cereal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
